comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: August "Garry" Hermann called a meeting of member team owners of the Baseball Commission to discuss difficulties arising from competition of the new Federal League. New York Times story: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9506E5DD1730E7...

comment.author: 46624315@N04
comment._content: Hermann was also the right hand man to "Boss" George B. Cox in Cincinnati's political machine
